mean_cn: vt.释放；发布，发行；  v.免除（责任、债务等）；  n.解除；释放；发布
mean_en: to let somebody/something come out of a place where they have been kept or trapped; to stop holding something or stop it from being held so that it can move, fly, fall, etc. freely
sentence: The prisoner was released after its sentence was complete.
sentence_trans: 这个囚犯服完刑后被释放了。
